title: Paris apartment merges "minimalism with the grandeur of Napoleon-era"
description: French architect Joris Poggioli has renovated his Paris apartment, aiming to preserve its historic features while integrating modern design elements. Poggioli sought to renovate the apartment located in a mansion that was once Napoleon Bonaparte's office, whi…
